comment: Abigail Jackson: I've been using Ally Invest for over a year and have been very pleased with their service. The trading platform is reliable and customer support is excellent.
William Anderson: Ally Invest is decent overall. The platform works well most of the time, but their customer service could be improved.
Sofia Hernandez: I've been using Ally Invest for over a year and have been very pleased with their service. The trading platform is reliable and customer support is excellent.
Charlotte Lewis: Ally Invest is okay. Not the best, not the worst. Their platform is reliable but fees are average.
Abigail Jackson: I've had a mixed experience with Ally Invest. Some features are good, others need work.
